markdownRemark.html: Located on the border between Marbella and Mijas Costa, opposite the marina after which it is named. Really good well maintained course, the front nine is more trickier than the back nine but plenty of interesting holes to play. A very relaxed atmosphere in the clubhouse afterwards.

frontmatter.title: Cabopino Golf Marbella
frontmatter.description: Cabopino Golf Marbella - Located on the border between Marbella and Mijas Costa, opposite the marina after which it is named. Really good well maintained course, the front nine is more trickier than the back nine but plenty of interesting holes to play. A very relaxed atmosphere in the clubhouse afterwards.
frontmatter.address: Urb. Artola Alta S/N, Coordenadas GPS W 4º 44´ 24´´ --  N 36º 29´39´´, Spain
